content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation, electrical_id 30580.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30580) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid" and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings "out of fuel"; contains water (≈190 at 15°C); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); now linked to fluid_system [166211] and providing steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; linked to fluid_system [166211].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 166211, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 166210, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 166223, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 166222, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 166218, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 166227, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 166226, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 166229, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 166230, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 166231, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection Failures:
   - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers 165547, 165631, 165713, 165797, 165879, 165963, 166045, and 166129 failed to locate any candidate near Position(-5.5, 19.5).
   - Tip: Validate and use the active fluid_system identifier from the current map state (166211 for the boiler’s pipe group) to ensure connection commands target an existing candidate pipe group.

• Inadequate Candidate Search Radius:
   - All connection attempts within a 15-tile radius of Position(-5.5, 19.5) returned zero candidate pipe groups.
   - Tip: Adjust the search radius or revalidate the spatial parameters of the pipeline network.
